verbs.description: Trump [V: has] long talked about jailing reporters in the US for writing news articles that the president finds unflattering .
[ARG0: Trump] has [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: talked] [ARG1: about jailing reporters in the US for writing news articles that the president finds unflattering] .
[ARG0: Trump] has long talked about [V: jailing] [ARG1: reporters] [ARGM-LOC: in the US] [ARGM-CAU: for writing news articles that the president finds unflattering] .
Trump has long talked about jailing reporters in the US for [V: writing] [ARG1: news articles that the president finds unflattering] .
Trump has long talked about jailing reporters in the US for writing news articles that [ARG0: the president] [V: finds] [ARG1: unflattering] .
